akn:section.akn:heading: Tariff treatment of products of uncooperative major drug producing or drug-transit countries

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Required action by President Subject to subsection (b), for every major drug producing country and every major drug-transit country, the President shall, on or after March 1, 1987, and March 1 of each succeeding year, to the extent considered necessary by the President to achieve the purposes of this subchapter—

(c) Duration of action The action taken by the President under paragraph (1), (2), or (3) of subsection (a) shall apply to the products of a foreign country that are entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, during the period that such action is in effect.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Standards and guidelines for determining major drug-transit countries

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Standards and guidelines for determining major drug-transit countries For each calendar year, the Secretary of State, after consultation with the appropriate committees of the Congress, shall establish numerical standards and other guidelines for determining which countries will be considered to be major drug-transit countries under section 2495(3)(A) and (B) of this title.
